actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act with respect to the earned income disregard.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act to permit a working AFDC beneficiary to retain a larger amount of his or her earnings, for purposes of the earned income disregard.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act with respect to the earned income disregard.
